name: @jyv/src
description: An out-of-the box Generic Repository interface for NodeJS backends.
author: Gus Crawford <gus.crawford@envisageny.com>

scripts.pm2:mongod: pm2 start --name "mongod (jyve sandbox)" npm -- run mongod
scripts.general-express-app: pm2 kill && yarn pm2:mongod &&  cd test/general-express-app && yarn install && cd ../../ && pm2 start test/general-express-app
scripts.express-ts-api: pm2 kill && cd test/express-ts-api && yarn dev:core && yarn dev:mongo && tsc && cd ../../ && yarn pm2:mongod &&  pm2 start test/express-ts-api
scripts.postinstall: cd core && yarn install && cd ../mongo && yarn install && cd ../test && yarn install
